00163 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00164                                                                         \
00165                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00166                                                                         \
00167                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00168                                 {                                       \
00169                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00170                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00171                                                 defchild,history)       \
00172                                 }
00173 
00174 
00193 #define RKH_CREATE_BASIC_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,prepro )           \
00194                                                                         \
00195                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00196                                                                         \
00197                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00198                                 {                                       \
00199                                     mkbase(RKH_BASIC,id,name),          \
00200                                     mkbasic(en,ex,parent,name,prepro)   \
00201                                 }

00225 #define RKH_CREATE_COND_STATE( name,id )                                \
00226                                                                         \
00227                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00228                                                                         \
00229                                 rkhrom RKHSCOND_T name =                \
00230                                 {                                       \
00231                                     mkbase(RKH_CONDITIONAL,id,name),    \
00232                                     name##_trtbl                        \
00233                                 }

00255                                 rkhrom RKHSJUNC_T name =                \

00258                                     action, target                      \
00259                                 }

00278 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00279                                                                         \
00280                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00281                                                                         \
00282                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00283                                 {                                       \
00284                                     mkbase(RKH_DHISTORY,id,name),       \
00285                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00286                                 }
